name: The Feast (kelpdance)
description:
Will you be there?

If you're interested in more details, see my project "From Zane": https://kelpdance.itch.io/from-zane

Note: Be sure to make the game fullscreen by hitting the button at the bottom-right corner under the game. That way, the screen won't move when you move in the game.

Music: Paper Mario 64 - City in the Stars
